name: Person Do Thing More
description:
Official extension app for Person Do Thing, the game of simple words and big ideas! Using only the 36 basic words in the PDT wordbank (words like Person, Do and Thing), describe a target word for your friends to guess. Person Do Thing will test your creativity to the limits, and have you playing with words in ways you never imagined.

The free version of the app has full functionality and 150+ target words, but true fans will love Person Do Thing More, the extension app with 550+ target words for hours/days/weeks more fun. Person do thing more, person feel more good!
